类的使用
com.rd.recorder.AudioPlayer

  • 使用AudioPlayer的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.rd.recorder  

    • com.rd.recorder中AudioPlayer的使用

      参数类型为AudioPlayer的com.rd.recorder中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void AudioPlayer.OnCompletionListener.onCompletion(AudioPlayer mp)
      Called when the end of a media source is reached during playback.
      boolean AudioPlayer.OnErrorListener.onError(AudioPlayer mp, int what, int extra)
      Called to indicate an error.
      boolean AudioPlayer.OnInfoListener.onInfo(AudioPlayer mp, int what, int extra)
      Called to indicate an info or a warning.
      void AudioPlayer.OnPreparedListener.onPrepared(AudioPlayer mp)
      Called when the media file is ready for playback.
